alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Inland Nassau; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NASSAU...BRADFORD... SOUTHEASTERN BAKER...EASTERN UNION...NORTHWESTERN CLAY AND WEST CENTRAL DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were reported along a line extending from near Macclenny to near New River. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Raiford, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, Beasley, New River, Bryceville, Sampson, and Baldwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Inland Nassau; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval
